translations.translation: We have guarded them from every cursed Shaytan -
And We have preserved it from every accursed devil,
and have protected them against every accursed satan
We have protected them from every condemned devil,
And We have kept it guarded from every outcast devil.
And We have guarded it (near heaven) from every outcast Shaytan (devil).
And We guard it against every accursed Shaitan,
and guarded them from every accursed Satan
And We have guarded it from every outcast devil,
and We have guarded it from every accursed devil:
And We have guarded it from every Satan damned.
and We have guarded them from every outcast Satan,
And (moreover) We have guarded them from every cursed devil:
And We have guarded it (near heaven) from every outcast Shaitan (devil).
and guarded them from every stoned satan.
And We guarded them from every outcast devil.
And We have protected it from every devil expelled [from the mercy of Allah]
[15:17] and We have guarded them, with meteors, from every outcast devil;
273 (And We have guarded it from every outcast devil) from every accursed devil who is chased away by the stars to prevent them, i.e. the satans, from listening to the angels,

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { مِن كُلِّ شَيْطَانٍ رَّجِيمٍ } معناه مَرجُومٍ بالنّجومِ

translations.translation: And His saying, {of every devil, accursed} means condemned by the stars.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَ } مع ذلك { حَفِظْنَاهَا مِن } اطلاع { كُلِّ شَيْطَانٍ رَّجِيمٍ } [الحجر: 17] على ما فيها من السرائر والحكم المودعة
